alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 08 at 1:39PM PST until March 09 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 or more inches. Winds gusting 30 to 45 mph. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and will lead to areas of blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
